name: GEA Space
goal:
GEA Space, founded by Franco Gottifredi, aims to bring his 20+ years of expertise in space domain activities and his innovating pulse into a company able to offer a wide spectrum of solutions and competences to different customers.
With a significant experience in user needs analysis, in complex system design, in solutions and applications life cycle activities and in the critical technology elements development and assessment process, GEA Space is able to lead and support activities and roles like:
• Technical project management;
• System of Systems design;
• System and subsystem architectural design and development;
• Solutions and Applications concept definition, design and development;
• User Needs analyses and forecast;
• Technology trend analyses;
• Technical support in Cost Benefit Analyses;
• Standardisation technical support in maritime, road and aviation domains;
• Technical advice in different domains as aviation, maritime, rail, space, road transport, timing & synchronisation, high positioning accuracy, agriculture, disasters prevention, monitoring and management, Earth observations, Telecommunications.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport
